description: Try our easy to follow Feta & Veg-Loaded Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury muffin,Zucchini,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mar 2020,Sesame free,Baking,Peanut free
name: Feta & VegLoaded Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mint leaves (plus extra leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large 12hole muffin tray with paper cases.

Place peas and broccoli in a food processor and pulse until coarsely chopped. Add eggs and yoghurt, and pulse until just combined. Transfer to a large bowl, stir in zucchini, threequarters of the feta, mint, zest, lemon juice and oil. Add flour, season and stir to combine.

Spoon mixture evenly into cases. Bake for 35 minutes or until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean. Stand in pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a cooling rack. Top with remaining feta and extra mint. Serve.
